Strings.Text: Trying to figure out the data \nscattered on the floor.{pause}
Many documents and papers are \nscattered on the sofa.{pause}{clear}Looks like somebody was in here \nsearching for the data on the {pause}{clear}citizens of this time.{pause}
It is the “Timegate” which links \nthis world and the “present” {pause}{clear}time. It is totally destroyed. \nRepairing it seems impossible.{pause}
There are control panels and time \nsettings for the Timegate.{pause}{clear}The keyboard and the screen \nhave been completely destroyed.{pause}
It's an engine starting unit. {pause}{clear}The battery to start the engine \nhas been destroyed.{pause}
She's looking at the engine \nstarter, thinking.{pause}
Trying to figure out the data \nscattered on the floor.{pause}
